scripts.openapi-beds24-all: npm run openapi-beds24-sveltekit && npm run openapi-beds24-strapi
scripts.strapi-types-sveltekit: cd ../strapi && npm run gen-types-strapi && npm run gen-types-strapi && strapi-types-4-strapi
scripts.strapi-types-all: cd ../strapi && npm run gen-types-strapi && npm run gen-types-strapi && strapi-types-4-strapi && npm run strapi-types-4-sveltekit

scripts.format-all: cd ../strapi-cms && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format
